Name: Millennium Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist & dust with grated nutmeg.
Review: Somewhat reminiscent of a cognac-laced Hawaiian pizza. Yum!
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Dale DeGroff , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Millennium Cocktail contains 194 calories
